metadata.name: Esentutl Steals Browser Information
metadata.comment: One way Qbot steals sensitive information is by extracting browser data from Internet Explorer and Microsoft Edge by using the built-in utility esentutl.exe

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\esentutl.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('esentutl.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-r')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/r')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('–r')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('—r')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('―r'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\windows\\webcache')))

output.summary: One way Qbot steals sensitive information is by extracting browser data from Internet Explorer and Microsoft Edge by using the built-in utility esentutl.exe
